{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.04846v1", "title": "Iterated and Generalized Iterated Integrals", "summary": "For a differential field $F$ having an algebraically closed field of
constants, we analyze the structure of Picard-Vessiot extensions of $F$ whose
differential Galois groups are unipotent algebraic groups and apply these
results to study stability problems in integration in finite terms and the
inverse problem in differential Galois theory for unipotent algebraic groups.", "main_category": "math.AC", "categories": "math.AC", "published": "2025-04-07T08:59:28Z"}
